schema.description: Report DHCP relay user information to network manager.

check-option82.description: Enable or disable check option82 in request packet.

packet-count.description: The received packet count before packet suppression.

non-online-user-mismatched-option54-dele.description: Receive DHCP non-online-user mismatched option54 request packet,delete or not delete user.

hex.description: DHCP option type is HEX string.

ip.description: DHCP option type is IP string.

user-quota.description: Specify quota of DHCP users on this interface. It's toplimit depends on ability of the device.

server-group.description: DHCP relay server group index of the interface.[1,20].

1:ASCII string type.
2:HEX string type.

bind-relay-instance.description: The relay instance of the interface.

dest-port.description: Destination UDP port of sending packet to DHCP relay by DHCP server.

detect-time.description: Server ARP or ping detect timeout seconds.

client-policy.description: DHCP policy of the interface for DHCP client.
